name: office-add-in-sso-nodejs
title: Office Add-in that supports Single Sign-on to Office, the Add-in, and Microsoft Graph
shortDescription: The getAccessToken API in Office.js enables users who are signed into Office to get access to an AAD-protected add-in and to Microsoft Graph without needing to sign-in again.
longDescription: The getAccessToken API in Office.js enables users who are signed into Office to get access to an AAD-protected add-in and to Microsoft Graph without needing to sign-in again.

references.name: Create a Node.js Office Add-in that uses single sign-on
references.description: Users can sign in to Office, and your Office Web Add-in can take advantage of this sign-in process to authorize users to your add-in and to Microsoft Graph without requiring users to sign in a second time.
